Bearer.description: Please enter into field the word 'Bearer' following by space and JWT
Bearer.name: Authorization

metaDescription:
More and more non-financial companies are looking into new ways to boost revenue through embedded finance as the financial services industry has been disrupted. Through open banking, we remove any legacy friction within online payments and other financial processes to create new, instant paths for modern companies to fully own finance, deliver proprietary solutions and, ultimately, reach the success they desire.

𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗽𝗮𝘆𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀. | Let your customers pay with their bank.
𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗽𝗮𝘆𝗼𝘂𝘁𝘀. | Send funds to anyone from your business.
𝗣𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗶𝘂𝗺 𝗶𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝘀. | Holistic financial data to streamline your KYC checks.
𝗦𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗺𝘀. | All our products rolled into one single interface. Zero coding.

Finshark is a licensed Payment Institution by the Financial Supervisory Authority, authorised to provide payment services across EU/EES.

methods.description: Get all Payment Requests for selected organizationId.

parameters.name: searchStatus
parameters.description: Search by payment request status, comma separated (E.G. "AUTHORIZED, IN_PROGRESS" will fetch only payments with AUTHORIZED and IN_PROGRESS status).

parameters.name: searchClientAccess
parameters.description: Environment on which the call has been invoked, comma separated (e.g. "PRODUCTION, SANDBOX", or "SANDBOX"). Blank returns all.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort response by clientId, recipient, status.

responses.description: Payment request returned as respone on create action.

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: If set, payouts created from that date will be returned. Value must be set in Unix epoch time format (milliseconds).

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: If set, payouts created until that date will be returned. Value must be set in Unix epoch time format (milliseconds).

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: If set, payouts filtered by status will be returned.

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: If set, payouts filtered by paymentId will be returned.

responses.description: The request has been fulfilled and the payout is authorized.
The request has been fulfilled and a recurring payment is created.
Request was fulfilled and recurring payment is deleted.
Returned when request has been timed out in the gateway.

parameters.name: ignoreSizeLimit
parameters.description: If set to true, any signing basket size limits are ignored.

responses.description: The request has been fulfilled and Signing Basket is deleted.

repositoryDescription: Finshark offers embedded finance solutions through open banking to modern companies, providing instant paths to fully own finance and reach success. Pay, payout, streamline KYC checks, and access all products in one interface. Fully licensed Payment Institution in EU/EES. Finshark's {language} SDK generated by Konfig (https://konfigthis.com/).
typescriptSdkFirstRequestCode:
// Get list of accounts.
const listResponse = finshark.accounts.list()
